uqa.stats module¶

Compute and log simple dataset stats.

uqa.stats.mapping_str(mapping: Mapping, item_str_template: str = '{k}: {v}', item_sep=' | ') → str[source]¶

Returns a string representation of a mapping.

Parameters

  • mapping (Mapping) – A mapping

  • item_str_template (str) – A template string with {k} and {v} placeholders for the entries key and value respectively

  • item_sep (str) – The separator to use between mapping entries string.

Returns

str – The mapping representation as a string

uqa.stats.stats(fcontent: Union[Dict, List], dataformat: str = 'default') → Counter[str][source]¶

Return simple stats over fcontent.

Count the numbers of articles and contexts.
For fquad dataformat also count the number of questions
Parameters

  • fcontent (dataset.TJson) – The data container

  • dataformat (str, default="default") – The data format

Returns

collections.Counter – A Counter instance with entries articles and contexts and optionaly questions.

uqa.stats.stats_dl(dataloader: uqa.dataset.DataLoader, detailed: bool = True) → Counter[str][source]¶

Return simple stats over the dataset.DataLoader instance dataloader.

For default format dataset count the number articles and contexts.
For fquad format dataset also count the number of questions
Parameters

  • dataloader (dataset.DataLoader) – A dataset.DataLoader instance.

  • detailed (bool, default=True) – If True logs per file stats

Returns

collections.Counter – A Counter instance with entries articles and contexts and optionaly questions.
